title: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015
text: Flights MSP LIT, STL April 2013 February 2015: Airline -time data flights departing arriving MSP, LIT, STL April 2013 February 2015. Also includes useful ‘metadata’ airlines, airports, weather, planes. Code adapted nycflights13. Feel free use /fork project!

title: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015
text: can install development version mspflights GitHub : using renv:

title: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015
text: Changelog: See “Changelog” NEWS.md. Planned: TODO

title: Airline names — airlines
text: Look airline names carrier codes.

title: Airline names — airlines
text: Data frame columns carrier Two letter abbreviation. name Full name.

text: https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.aspx?gnoyr_VQ=FGJ&QO_fu146_anzr=b0-gvzr

title: Airline names — airlines
code: airlines #> # A tibble: 16 × 2 #>    carrier name                               #>    <chr>   <chr>                              #>  1 9E      Endeavor Air Inc.                  #>  2 AA      American Airlines Inc.             #>  3 AS      Alaska Airlines Inc.               #>  4 B6      JetBlue Airways                    #>  5 DL      Delta Air Lines Inc.               #>  6 EV      ExpressJet Airlines LLC d/b/a aha! #>  7 F9      Frontier Airlines Inc.             #>  8 FL      AirTran Airways Corporation        #>  9 HA      Hawaiian Airlines Inc.             #> 10 MQ      Envoy Air                          #> 11 OO      SkyWest Airlines Inc.              #> 12 UA      United Air Lines Inc.              #> 13 US      US Airways Inc.                    #> 14 VX      Virgin America                     #> 15 WN      Southwest Airlines Co.             #> 16 YV      Mesa Airlines Inc.

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: Useful metadata airports.

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: data frame columns: faa FAA airport code. name Usual name airport. lat, lon Location airport. alt Altitude, feet. tz Timezone offset GMT. dst Daylight savings time zone. = Standard US DST: starts second Sunday March, ends first Sunday November. U = unknown. N = dst. tzone IANA time zone, determined GeoNames webservice.

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: https://openflights.org, downloaded 2014-06-27

title: Airport metadata — airports
code: airports #> # A tibble: 1,251 × 8 #>    faa   name                                 lat    lon   alt    tz dst   tzone #>    <chr> <chr>                              <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr> <chr> #>  1 AAF   Apalachicola Regional Airport       29.7  -85.0    20    -5 A     Amer… #>  2 AAP   Andrau Airpark                      29.7  -95.6    79    -6 A     Amer… #>  3 ABE   Lehigh Valley International Airpo…  40.7  -75.4   393    -5 A     Amer… #>  4 ABI   Abilene Regional Airport            32.4  -99.7  1791    -6 A     Amer… #>  5 ABL   Ambler Airport                      67.1 -158.    334    -9 A     Amer… #>  6 ABQ   Albuquerque International Sunport   35.0 -107.   5355    -7 A     Amer… #>  7 ABR   Aberdeen Regional Airport           45.4  -98.4  1302    -6 A     Amer… #>  8 ABY   Southwest Georgia Regional Airport  31.5  -84.2   197    -5 A     Amer… #>  9 ACK   Nantucket Memorial Airport          41.3  -70.1    47    -5 A     Amer… #> 10 ACT   Waco Regional Airport               31.6  -97.2   516    -6 A     Amer… #> # ℹ 1,241 more rows  if (require("dplyr")) {   airports %>%     rename(dest = faa) %>%     semi_join(flights)   flights %>% anti_join(airports %>% rename(dest = faa))   airports %>%     rename(origin = faa) %>%     semi_join(flights) } #> Loading required package: dplyr #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union #> Joining with `by = join_by(dest)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(dest)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(origin)` #> # A tibble: 3 × 8 #>   origin name                                  lat   lon   alt    tz dst   tzone #>   <chr>  <chr>                               <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr> <chr> #> 1 EWR    Newark Liberty International Airpo…  40.7 -74.2    18    -5 A     Amer… #> 2 JFK    John F Kennedy International Airpo…  40.6 -73.8    13    -5 A     Amer… #> 3 LGA    La Guardia Airport                   40.8 -73.9    21    -5 A     Amer…

title: Flights data — flights
text: -time data flights departed NYC (.e. JFK, LGA EWR) 2013.

title: Flights data — flights
text: Data frame columns year, month, day Date departure. dep_time, arr_time Actual departure arrival times (format HHMM HMM), local tz. sched_dep_time, sched_arr_time Scheduled departure arrival times (format HHMM HMM), local tz. dep_delay, arr_delay Departure arrival delays, minutes. Negative times represent early departures/arrivals. carrier Two letter carrier abbreviation. See airlines get name. flight Flight number. tailnum Plane tail number. See planes additional metadata. origin, dest Origin destination. See airports additional metadata. air_time Amount time spent air, minutes. distance Distance airports, miles. hour, minute Time scheduled departure broken hour minutes. time_hour Scheduled date hour flight POSIXct date. Along origin, can used join flights data weather data.

title: Flights data — flights
text: RITA, Bureau transportation statistics, https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.aspx?gnoyr_VQ=FGJ&QO_fu146_anzr=b0-gvzr

what: mspflights: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015 — mspflights-package
title: mspflights: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015 — mspflights-package
text: Airline -time data flights departing arriving MSP, LIT, STL April 2013 February 2015. Also includes useful 'metadata' airlines, airports, weather, planes.

title: mspflights: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015 — mspflights-package
text: Maintainer: John Benninghoff jbenninghoff@mac.com (ORCID)

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: Plane metadata plane tailnumbers found FAA aircraft registry. American Airways (AA) Envoy Air (MQ) report fleet numbers rather tail numbers matched.

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: data frame columns: tailnum Tail number. year Year manufactured. type Type plane. manufacturer, model Manufacturer model. engines, seats Number engines seats. speed Average cruising speed mph. engine Type engine.

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: FAA Aircraft registry, https://www.faa.gov/licenses_certificates/aircraft_certification/aircraft_registry/releasable_aircraft_download

title: Plane metadata — planes
code: planes #> # A tibble: 3,360 × 9 #>    tailnum  year type              manufacturer model engines seats speed engine #>    <chr>   <int> <chr>             <chr>        <chr>   <int> <int> <int> <chr>  #>  1 N10156   2004 Fixed wing multi… EMBRAER      EMB-…       2    55    NA Turbo… #>  2 N102UW   1998 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  3 N103US   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  4 N104UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  5 N10575   2002 Fixed wing multi… EMBRAER      EMB-…       2    55    NA Turbo… #>  6 N105UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  7 N107US   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  8 N108UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  9 N109UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #> 10 N110UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #> # ℹ 3,350 more rows  if (require("dplyr")) {   # Flights that don't have plane metadata   flights %>% anti_join(planes, "tailnum") } #> # A tibble: 51,393 × 19 #>     year month   day dep_time sched_dep_time dep_delay arr_time sched_arr_time #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>    <int>          <int>     <dbl>    <int>          <int> #>  1  2013     1     1      558            600        -2      753            745 #>  2  2013     1     1      559            600        -1      941            910 #>  3  2013     1     1      600            600         0      837            825 #>  4  2013     1     1      602            605        -3      821            805 #>  5  2013     1     1      608            600         8      807            735 #>  6  2013     1     1      611            600        11      945            931 #>  7  2013     1     1      623            610        13      920            915 #>  8  2013     1     1      624            630        -6      840            830 #>  9  2013     1     1      628            630        -2     1137           1140 #> 10  2013     1     1      629            630        -1      824            810 #> # ℹ 51,383 more rows #> # ℹ 11 more variables: arr_delay <dbl>, carrier <chr>, flight <dbl>, #> #   tailnum <chr>, origin <chr>, dest <chr>, air_time <dbl>, distance <dbl>, #> #   hour <dbl>, minute <dbl>, time_hour <dttm>

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: Hourly meteorological data LGA, JFK EWR.

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: data frame columns: origin Weather station. Named origin facilitate merging flights data. year, month, day, hour Time recording. temp, dewp Temperature dewpoint F. humid Relative humidity. wind_dir, wind_speed, wind_gust Wind direction (degrees), speed gust speed (mph). precip Precipitation, inches. pressure Sea level pressure millibars. visib Visibility miles. time_hour Date hour recording POSIXct date.

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: ASOS download Iowa Environmental Mesonet, https://mesonet.agron.iastate.edu/request/download.phtml.

title: mspflights 0.0.1
text: Initial release implementing updated version nycflights13: Imported nycflights13 code data Updated nycflights13 data using tidyverse/nycflights13#53 Updated data current sources Code data cleanup Future releases create data travel MSP LIT, MSP STL April 2013 February 2015.
